data.title: Society Alumni Honors
data.meta_description: Society Alumni hold more than 100 of the world's most prestigious STEM awards. Here is a listing of some of the most notable award winners.
data.text:
Society Alumni include:

15 Nobel Prize winners

2 Fields Medal recipients

13 National Medal of Science recipients

2 Enrico Fermi Award winners

27 MacArthur Foundation Fellows

3 Albert Lasker Basic Medical Research Award winners

8 Breakthrough Prize winners

67 Rhodes Scholars

35 National Academy of Engineering inductees*

126 National Academy of Sciences inductees*

245 Sloan Research Fellows

Nobel Prize Winners:

Leon Cooper (STS 1947), 1972 prize in Physics

Gerald Edelman (STS 1946), 1972 prize in Physiology or Medicine

Ben Mottelson (STS 1944), 1975 prize in Physics

Sheldon Glashow (STS 1950), 1979 prize in Physics

Walter Gilbert (STS 1949), 1980 prize in Chemistry

Roald Hoffmann (STS 1955), 1981 prize in Chemistry

Frank Wilczek (STS 1967), 2004 prize in Physics

John Hall (STS 1952), 2005 prize in Physics

Susan Solomon (ISEF 1972), 2007 in Peace

Roger Tsien (STS 1968), 2008 prize in Chemistry

Alvin Roth (STS 1968), 2012 prize in Economics

Martin Karplus (STS 1947), 2013 prize in Chemistry

Paul Modrich (STS 1964; ISEF 1964), 2015 prize in Chemistry

Kip Thorne (STS 1958), 2017 prize in Physics

John Clauser (ISEF 1959-1960), 2022 prize in Physics
